In childhood I spent more time studying than playing
During studies I was an intelligent, successful and interested student
In adolescence I had social relationships but didn't establish strong emotional relationships with my friends
In my work environment I act politically and seek step-by-step career advancement and power
At work I prefer to work more with men than women, but my relationship lacks sexuality (it's of cooperative or sisterly-brotherly type)
When working I'm very serious and precise and do all my work completely and correctly, and my boss is proud of having an exemplary employee, colleague and companion like me
I despise making mistakes - that's why I try to do everything precisely and completely
I clearly see others' mistakes and shortcomings and generally have ability in criticizing others, catching their errors and giving warnings
My job and professional specialty has very high priority, even compared to marriage
I'm an orderly and organized, rule-abiding and socially polite person, and this is my pride
My success comes from my intellectual ability and logical thinking

Generally I'm not affected by my emotions - sometimes when I get emotional, I don't pay attention to it and do my normal work. My motto in life is that in life reason and logic play a more important role than emotions and one must act wisely

My prominent characteristic is seeking academic and higher education and valid certificates, and whatever work I start I continue to the end until I reach mastery. In other words, success in work and study is an important priority of my life and this is a criterion for evaluation and decision-making for me
My happiness comes when my life is based on advancement plan and under my management
I usually like to be aware of world events
In my married life logic rules and I've tried or try to marry someone with high social status
I prefer that between me and my spouse, more than passion and excitement and love, there be agreement, praise and respect
In sexual relationship it takes a while for me to feel my body and warm up, and I also value hygiene
I feed and raise my children based on current world educational and scientific principles
In cases where a woman is sexually abused, I believe she herself also has a significant share in creating those conditions with carelessness in her behavior or choices
When people make mistakes or I see emotional people, their behavior and work seem very strange and unbelievable to me, and others say I look at them with wise-foolish gaze
At parties I often enter political, social and intellectual conversations instead of gossip
I have a plan for my life and despise lack of planning and wasting time. I always plan my work in advance and use every single moment usefully
I usually dress formally, neatly, elegantly, ironed and starched
I prefer to spend my free time in city and clean parks rather than in wild nature
